pma:database.name: sensors
pma:database.pma:table: CREATE TABLE `sensor_data` ( `Id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `DEVICEKEY` varchar(64) NOT NULL, `DEVICENAME` longtext NOT NULL, `DEVICELOC` longtext NOT NULL, `DEVICETEMP` decimal(10,0) NOT NULL, `DEVICEHUM` decimal(10,0) NOT NULL, `DATE` datetime NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`Id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=0 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;
